Index.title: Hello world!
Index.about: An ecommerce website is your digital storefront on the internet. It facilitates the transaction between a buyer and seller. It is the virtual space where you showcase products, and online customers make selections. Your website acts as the product shelves, sales staff, and cash register of your online business channel.
Index.banner heading: offers you convenient shopping experience at any scale

Index.s1 txt: From finding the perfect product to quickly resolving queries, we're always ready to help.
Index.s2 p: Our technical team is here to help
Index.s2 txt: Feel free to reach out to us for further assistance or during any inconvenience. All of our staffs are always happy to assist you.
